overview: Join TransWorld MX as they take you behind the scenes with the best racers and freestyle motocross riders on the planet. Features a variety of locations, from the legendary Castillo Ranch to the Mulisha Compound and everywhere in between. You ll see the pros in the business testing at top-secret locations, freeriders going huge in the natural terrain of Beaumont, Utah, Reche Canyon and more, and even score a pass into Ricky Carmichael s own backyard. Filmed entirely on 16mm film, Stone Spray Sandwich promises to be the ultimate moto film of 2005 and is packed with tons of bonus features.
title: Stone Spray Sandwich
